DOC.brief_summary: Investigation of a new pill containing an estrogen and a progestin in order to monitor the inhibition of the ovulation in young healthy females over 3 treatment cycles
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Inhibition of Ovulation of Two Oral Estrogen/Progestogen Regimens in Healthy, Young Females Over a Period of 3 Treatment Cycles
DOC.criteria: Healthy female volunteers, Age 18 35 years Contraindications for use of a combined (estrogen/progestogen) contraceptive (e.g. history of venous/arterial thromboembolic disease) Regular intake of medication Clinically relevant findings (ECG, blood pressure, physical, gynecological examination, laboratory examination) Anovulatory pretreatment cycle
